name: Wayfarer Prototype
description:
Wayfarer is a roguelike nautical adventure that aims to tell an emergent story through systems, simulation and narrative. Manage your ship's resources, engage with your crew's needs and capabilities, and explore the mysteries and horrors that lurk in the depths of the Shifting Seas.

There's plenty of discoveries to be made so hold fast Captain, your crew and ship needs you.

First release
This is the first public release of Wayfarer since I started on the game back in 2021. I hope you can see the potential in it and will give me your thoughts and feedback on the idea over on the discord server. 

Minimum Requirements
Needs a newish GPU that can run DirectX 11.1

Known Issues
Sometimes the orders page can get stuck after getting to know your crew. Happens sporadically so still trying to figure out that one.
developers: Alexander Birke aka Out Of Bounds Games
